location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'View of Bagdad from the roof of the Residency.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:138 x 188 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘34’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of Baghdad from the roof of the British Residency. In the background a pontoon bridge extends across the Tigris. One small craft, a barge are visible at centre; right of centre several sailing boats are moored. At right several figures are visible along the quay beside two-storey stone buildings and palms. At least three minarets are visible in the background at right.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'View of Bagdad from the roof of the Residency.Pencil, above image at right: ‘34’; ‘12’
